Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change we be held at David B's. Funds will be donated to the Relay for Life.
February 21, 4:30-7:00

DRB Volunteer.desc: The City of Barberton is in need of 3 volunteers to sit on the Design Review Board. Check the press release for more information

Job Fair.desc:
City of Barberton is hosting a Job and Resource Fair Saturday, March 22 from 10am-1pm at the Active Adult Center.

The Magic Egg Hunt will be Saturday, April 19, 2013 at 11:00 am at Tuscora Park

City offices will be closed Thursday, November 27 and Friday, November 28 in observance of Thanksgiving
